notes.player: Power weapons often deal high Damage and have the Penetrating Trait while active (Imperium Maledictum, page 127). The following weapons have additional abilities, noted at the end of their entries. The Xenophase Blade is an ancient weapon thought to belong to a long-dead alien dynasty. The unnatural energy field it produces cleave through armour, force fields, and even metaphysical wards or protections. Questioning the weaponâ€™s origins, even among the Ordo Xenos, is cause for immediate termination. The Xenophase Blade is a Power Weapon that ignores at least half of the damage reduction from Armour, Force Fields, or any Psychic Power.
